message: Let's be fair and split it almost equally, I'll take a bit more since I made the offer
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think it's only fair I get the slightly better split this round since the value decreases for me with each turn.
Considering the inflation, I'll take a bit less than last time, but still want a slightly bigger share
Okay Alice, let's make this simple. We'll split it evenly. Inflation is only going to hurt us both in the long run.
